action.action-desc: Mr. Rush introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform

form.official-title: To amend the Civil Rights Cold Case Records Collection Act of 2018 to extend the termination date of the Civil Rights Cold Case Records Review Board.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Civil Rights Cold Case Investigations Support Act of 2022.

section.header: Civil Rights Cold Case Records Review Board extension of tenure
section.text: Section 5(n)(1) of Civil Rights Cold Case Records Collection Act of 2018 (44 U.S.C. 2107 note; Public Law 115–426) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking 4 years and inserting 7 years; and
by striking 4-year period and inserting 7-year period.
